name: Room 400
description:
░▒▓█ ░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓

Static, a voice demanding you find your way out, and a

strange  room you've never seen before.

░▒▓█ ░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓

Room 400 is a short kinetic novel with point and click elements about the unfortunate subject 38 as he is forced to figure out how to escape room 400. tw: decapitation

You can find more of my work HERE and if you want to support what I do check out my patreon!

Thank you, please enjoy! ♡♡♡
